Way.Com India Pvt Ltd is seeking a highly driven and dynamic Regional Manager - Operations to oversee operations, drive sales growth, and enhance vendor relationships in our expanding vertical.   • Strategic Growth & Innovation: Work with team leads to drive vertical growth, develop innovative ideas to boost long-term sales, and enhance customer experience.
  • Escalation Handling: Act as the primary point of contact for escalations, ensuring quick resolution while constantly improving knowledge and processes.

Work Hours: This is a startup environment with a growing vertical, and flexibility is key. The role requires the ability to work night shifts and occasionally weekends, if necessary, to meet operational needs.

  • Bachelor’s degree in any discipline.
  • Minimum of 3 years of experience in Operations or a related field.

job_description:
Design Strategist and UX Researcher

Marvelloux Apps (P) Ltd Ground Floor, Gayatri Building, Technopark Phase I, Trivandrum, 695581 http://www.marvelloux.com

Closing Date: 31, Aug 2025 Job Published: 04, Aug 2025 Contact Email: hr@marvelloux.com

Brief Description

1. Project Planning & Execution: - Oversee the full project lifecycle, including planning, execution, and delivery of UI/UX projects. - Define project goals, deliverables, timelines, and success criteria in collaboration with stakeholders. - Manage project scope and mitigate scope creep through proactive communication.

2. Team Management & Coordination: - Lead cross-functional teams, including designers, developers, and testers, ensuring seamless collaboration. - Assign tasks, set priorities, and monitor progress to ensure timely delivery. - Provide clear instructions and feedback to team members to maintain alignment with project objectives.

3. Client Interaction: - Act as the main point of contact for clients, ensuring their vision is translated into actionable project plans. - Conduct regular status updates, gather feedback, and manage client expectations. - Present project deliverables, including prototypes and final designs, to clients.

4. Quality Assurance & Usability: - Ensure all project outputs align with UI/UX best practices and meet usability standards. - Facilitate user testing sessions and incorporate feedback into design iterations. - Maintain consistency across designs in line with brand guidelines and user needs.

5. Risk & Budget Management: - Identify risks early and develop contingency plans to address them. - Manage project budgets, ensuring cost efficiency while maintaining quality.

6. Continuous Improvement: - Analyze project performance and implement process improvements for future initiatives. - Stay updated with the latest trends and tools in UI/UX design and project management.

Required Qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Design, Project Management, Computer Science, or related fields. - 1–2 years of experience managing UI/UX or digital design projects. - Proven experience with project management methodologies (Agile, Scrum, or Waterfall). - Familiarity with design tools such as Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD. - Proficiency in project management tools like Jira, Asana, Trello, or similar platforms.

Preferred Skills/Mandatory Requirements: - Strong understanding of UI/UX principles and user-centered design processes is a must. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for team collaboration and client interaction. - Stakeholder Management
summary: Seeking a Design Strategist and UX Researcher to oversee UI/UX projects, lead cross-functional teams, and ensure quality through user-centered design processes. The role involves client interaction, risk management, and continuous improvement.

  • Good knowledge of AWS services (EC2, S3, RDS, etc.) or VPS environments.
  • Proficiency in Git/GitHub workflows and managing collaborative repositories.
  • Excellent debugging, troubleshooting, and performance tuning skills.
  • Strong understanding of RESTful APIs, authentication (JWT, OAuth), and database design (MySQL/PostgreSQL).
  • Bonus: Experience with team management, task delegation, and agile workflows.

How to Apply:

Send your resume and a brief cover letter to rajesh@globcomsolution.com
